dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2972 IH: EITC for Older Workers Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Carey (for himself and Mr. Davis of Illinois) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the upper age limit on eligibility for the earned income tax credit.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the EITC for Older Workers Act of 2025.

section.header: Repeal of upper age limit on eligibility for earned income tax credit

subsection.text: Subclause (II) of section 32(c)(1)(A)(ii) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking but not attained age 65.
The amendment made by subsection (a) shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2025.
